metadata.title: CVE-2021-26263 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) issue in Discuss app of Odoo Community 14.0through 15.0, and Odoo Enterprise 14.0 through 15.0, allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script in the browser of a victim, byposting crafted contents.

criterions.comment: odoo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
